akn:section.akn:heading: Capital projects office within Agency for International Development

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment of office The Administrator of AID shall establish a capital projects office to carry out the purposes described in subsection (b).
(b) Purposes of office The purposes referred to in subsection (a) are—

(c) Activities of AID The Administrator of AID (acting through the capital projects office), in coordination with the appropriate members of the Trade Promotion Coordination Committee— The results of the study conducted pursuant to paragraph (6) shall be reported to the appropriate congressional committees within 12 months after October 28, 1992.
